QueryViewSpec.Name: Rate Increase Summary Delinquency and Cancellation Stats with Reversals Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Used to create Summary Stats regarding delinquency campaiangs and cancellations for the Rate Increase in 2014
QueryViewSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL:
with MadePayment as ( select rev.CONSTITUENTID, rev.ID as REVENUEID, max (rev_payment.DATE) as LATESTPAYMENT from dbo.SPONSORSHIP sp inner join dbo.REVENUESPLIT revsplit on sp.REVENUESPLITID = revsplit.ID inner join dbo.REVENUE rev on revsplit.REVENUEID = rev.ID inner join dbo.RECURRINGGIFTACTIVITY rg_act on rg_act.SOURCEREVENUEID = rev.ID inner join dbo.FINANCIALTRANSACTIONLINEITEM as payment on payment.ID = rg_act.PAYMENTREVENUEID inner join dbo.FINANCIALTRANSACTION as rev_payment on payment.FINANCIALTRANSACTIONID = rev_payment.ID where rev_payment.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT > 0 and rev_payment.DATE > '5/1/14'
group by rev.CONSTITUENTID, rev.ID )
,D2RateIncreaseRecipients as ( select CONSTITUENTID from dbo.INTERACTION where COMMENT like '%Rate Increase D2 Campaign%' )
,D3Recipients as ( select CONSTITUENTID from dbo.INTERACTION join dbo.INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORY ON dbo.INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORY.ID = dbo.INTERACTION.INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORYID where INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORY.[NAME] like 'Delinquent 3 Month' and INTERACTION.EXPECTEDDATE > '4/1/14' )
, Cancellations as ( select [USR_V_QUERY_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION\Sponsorship\Financial sponsor].[ID] as CONSTITUENTID, [USR_V_QUERY_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION\Sponsorship].[REASON] as CANCELLATIONREASON from [USR_V_QUERY_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION] as [USR_V_QUERY_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION] left outer join [V_QUERY_SPONSORSHIP] as [USR_V_QUERY_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION\Sponsorship] on [USR_V_QUERY_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION].[ID] = [USR_V_QUERY_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION\Sponsorship].[ID] left outer join [V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT] as [USR_V_QUERY_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION\Sponsorship\Financial sponsor] on [USR_V_QUERY_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION\Sponsorship].[FINANCIALSPONSOR] = [USR_V_QUERY_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION\Sponsorship\Financial sponsor].[ID] inner join [V_QUERY_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY] as [USR_V_QUERY_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION\Sponsorship Opportunity] on [USR_V_QUERY_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION].[SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID] = [USR_V_QUERY_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION\Sponsorship Opportunity].[ID] left outer join [V_QUERY_SPONSORSHIPTRANSACTION] as [USR_V_QUERY_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION\Sponsorship\Context transactions] on [USR_V_QUERY_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION\Sponsorship].[ID] = [USR_V_QUERY_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION\Sponsorship\Context transactions].[CONTEXTSPONSORSHIPID] where [USR_V_QUERY_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION\Sponsorship Opportunity].[TYPE] = N'Child' and ([USR_V_QUERY_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION\Sponsorship\Context transactions].[ACTION] in (N'Terminate', N'Cancel') and [USR_V_QUERY_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION\Sponsorship\Context transactions].[ISLASTTRANSACTION] = 1 and (([USR_V_QUERY_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION\Sponsorship\Context transactions].[REASON] not in (N'Account Correction', N'User Correction')) or [USR_V_QUERY_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION\Sponsorship\Context transactions].[REASON] is null or [USR_V_QUERY_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION\Sponsorship\Context transactions].[REASON] = '') and [USR_V_QUERY_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION\Sponsorship\Context transactions].[TRANSACTIONDATE] > '4/1/14') and [USR_V_QUERY_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION].[CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUS] in (N'Formerly Sponsored', N'Formerly Unpaid Sponsored') and ([USR_V_QUERY_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION\Sponsorship].[REASON] like 'autocancel%' or [USR_V_QUERY_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION\Sponsorship].[REASON] like 'Sponsor Request%') )
, Reversals as ( select ca.CONSTITUENTID as CONSTITUENTID from dbo.CONSTITUENTAPPEAL ca inner join dbo.APPEAL a on a.ID = ca.APPEALID left join dbo.CONSTITUENTAPPEALRESPONSE ca_response on ca_response.CONSTITUENTAPPEALID = ca.ID left join dbo.RESPONSE on ca_response.RESPONSEID = RESPONSE.ID where a.NAME like '%10555%' and lower (response.response) in ('partial - reversal', 'reversal') )
,RateIncreaseSegmentResponses as ( select MKTSEGMENT.NAME as SEGMENTNAME, MKTSEGMENT.DESCRIPTION as SEGMENTDESC, MKTSEGMENTCATEGORYCODE.DESCRIPTION as SEGMENTCATEGORY, MKTPACKAGE.NAME as PACKAGENAME, case when RESPONSE.RESPONSE is null then 'Did not respond' else RESPONSE.RESPONSE end as RESPONSE, srs.INCREASERATE, srs.ORIGINALSPONSORSHIPGIFTAMOUNT, srs.UPDATEDSPONSORSHIPGIFTAMOUNT, srs.REVENUELOOKUPID, ca.CONSTITUENTID as CONSTITUENTID
from dbo.MKTSEGMENTATIONSEGMENT inner join dbo.MKTSEGMENTATION ON MKTSEGMENTATION.ID = MKTSEGMENTATIONSEGMENT.SEGMENTATIONID inner join dbo.MKTSEGMENT on MKTSEGMENT.ID = MKTSEGMENTATIONSEGMENT.SEGMENTID inner join dbo.MKTSEGMENTCATEGORYCODE on MKTSEGMENTCATEGORYCODE.ID = MKTSEGMENT.SEGMENTCATEGORYCODEID inner join dbo.CONSTITUENTAPPEAL ca on ca.MKTSEGMENTATIONSEGMENTID = MKTSEGMENTATIONSEGMENT.ID inner join dbo.MKTPACKAGE on MKTPACKAGE.ID = ca.MKTPACKAGEID inner join dbo.APPEAL a on a.ID = ca.APPEALID left join dbo.USR_SPONSOR_RATECHANGE_SPONSORSHIPS srs on srs.SPONSORID = ca.CONSTITUENTID left join dbo.CONSTITUENTAPPEALRESPONSE ca_response on ca_response.CONSTITUENTAPPEALID = ca.ID left join dbo.RESPONSE on ca_response.RESPONSEID = RESPONSE.ID where a.NAME like '%10555%' )
,RateIncreaseSegments as ( select distinct risr.SEGMENTNAME, risr.SEGMENTDESC, risr.SEGMENTCATEGORY, risr.PACKAGENAME from RateIncreaseSegmentResponses risr )
,RateIncreaseConstituentCancellations as ( select SEGMENTNAME, count (distinct csponsorreq.CONSTITUENTID) as SponsorRequestCancellationCount, count (distinct cauto.CONSTITUENTID) as AutoCancellationCount from RateIncreaseSegmentResponses r left join Cancellations csponsorreq on r.CONSTITUENTID = csponsorreq.CONSTITUENTID and csponsorreq.CANCELLATIONREASON like 'sponsor%' left join Cancellations cauto on r.CONSTITUENTID = cauto.CONSTITUENTID and cauto.CANCELLATIONREASON like 'auto%' group by SEGMENTNAME )
,RateIncreaseConstituentD2 as ( select SEGMENTNAME, count (distinct r.CONSTITUENTID) as D2Count, count (distinct csponsorreq.CONSTITUENTID) as D2SponsorRequestCancellationCount, count (distinct cauto.CONSTITUENTID) as D2AutoCancellationCount, count (distinct mp.CONSTITUENTID) as D2MadePayment, count (distinct rev.CONSTITUENTID) as D2ReversalCount from RateIncreaseSegmentResponses r left join Cancellations csponsorreq on r.CONSTITUENTID = csponsorreq.CONSTITUENTID and csponsorreq.CANCELLATIONREASON like 'sponsor%' left join Cancellations cauto on r.CONSTITUENTID = cauto.CONSTITUENTID and cauto.CANCELLATIONREASON like 'auto%' left join MadePayment mp on mp.CONSTITUENTID = r.CONSTITUENTID left join Reversals rev on rev.CONSTITUENTID = r.CONSTITUENTID where r.CONSTITUENTID in (select CONSTITUENTID from D2RateIncreaseRecipients) group by SEGMENTNAME )
,RateIncreaseConstituentD3 as ( select SEGMENTNAME, count (distinct r.CONSTITUENTID) as D3Count, count (distinct csponsorreq.CONSTITUENTID) as D3SponsorRequestCancellationCount, count (distinct cauto.CONSTITUENTID) as D3AutoCancellationCount, count (distinct mp.CONSTITUENTID) as D3MadePayment, count (distinct rev.CONSTITUENTID) as D3ReversalCount
from RateIncreaseSegmentResponses r left join Cancellations csponsorreq on r.CONSTITUENTID = csponsorreq.CONSTITUENTID and csponsorreq.CANCELLATIONREASON like 'sponsor%' left join Cancellations cauto on r.CONSTITUENTID = cauto.CONSTITUENTID and cauto.CANCELLATIONREASON like 'auto%' left join MadePayment mp on mp.CONSTITUENTID = r.CONSTITUENTID left join Reversals rev on rev.CONSTITUENTID = r.CONSTITUENTID where r.CONSTITUENTID in (select CONSTITUENTID from D3Recipients) group by SEGMENTNAME )
select substring(seg.SEGMENTNAME, 25, 3) as SEGMENT, seg.SEGMENTDESC, substring(seg.PACKAGENAME,22,25) as PACKAGETYPE, coalesce(d2.D2Count,0) as RECEIVEDD2POSTCARD, coalesce(d2.D2SponsorRequestCancellationCount,0) as RECEIVEDD2POSTCARD_SPONSORREQUESTCANCELLATION, coalesce(d2.D2AutoCancellationCount,0) as RECEIVEDD2POSTCARD_AUTOCANCELLATION, coalesce(d2.D2MadePayment,0) as RECEIVEDD2POSTCARD_ANDMADEPAYMENT, coalesce(d2.D2ReversalCount,0) as RECEIVEDD2POSTCARD_REVERSAL, coalesce(d3.D3Count,0) as RECEIVEDD3, coalesce(d3.D3SponsorRequestCancellationCount,0) as RECEIVEDD3_SPONSORREQUESTCANCELLATION, coalesce(d3.D3AutoCancellationCount,0) as RECEIVEDD3_AUTOCANCELLATION, coalesce(d3.D3MadePayment,0) as RECEIVEDD3_ANDMADEPAYMENT, coalesce(d3.D3ReversalCount,0) as RECEIVEDD3_REVERSAL, coalesce(c.SponsorRequestCancellationCount,0) as SPONSORREQUESTCANCELLATION, coalesce(c.AutoCancellationCount,0) as AUTOCANCELLATION from RateIncreaseSegments seg left join RateIncreaseConstituentD2 d2 on seg.SEGMENTNAME = d2.SEGMENTNAME left join RateIncreaseConstituentD3 d3 on seg.SEGMENTNAME = d3.SEGMENTNAME left join RateIncreaseConstituentCancellations c on seg.SEGMENTNAME = c.SEGMENTNAME
